[http://global.level1.com/Wireless/WGR-6013/p-847.htm Product page]
[http://download.level1.com/level1/manual/WGR-6013-V1_UM_V1.0.pdf Manual] [http://www.speedguide.net/routers/levelone-wgr-6013-300mbps-wireless-gigabit-router-2552 On SpeedGuide.net] Per the manual, the default SSID is '''LevelOne'''. ==Images== File:WGR-6013-v1 Atistic.jpg|angled File:WGR-6013-v1.jpg|main File:WGR-6013-v1 F.jpg|front File:WGR-6013-v1 R.jpg|right File:WGR-6013-v1 B.jpg|back File:WGR-6013-v1 Bottom.jpg|bottom [[Has images::external| ]]
